author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Questex Travel Group Appoints Director to Lead MICE EventsTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Questex Travel Group Appoints Director to Lead MICE Events  
Questex Travel Group today announced the appointment of Kirk R. Lewis as director of GMITE portfolio, responsible for leading the company’s invitation-only, appointment-based Global Meeting & Incentive Travel Exchange events that cater exclusively to the MICE segment ─ meetings, incentives, conferences and exhibitions.
 
Kirk Lewis SM 10-2015 
He also will oversee the company’s International Meetings Review, a comprehensive online news source for the global meetings community.
 
Lewis most recently was publisher of Meetings & Conventions magazine, published by Northstar Travel Media LLC, where he enjoyed a 15-year career beginning as an associate publisher in 2000, then publisher in 2010. During his tenure, he oversaw the rebranding and relaunch of M&C magazine and its redesigned website.Prior to that, Lewis served as the northeast sales director for USA Today in New York, representing the financial and sports sectors. During that time, he was nominated for Sale of The Year for orchestrating a $4.2 million deal after six months with the company.
 
“Kirk is an energetic and accomplished sales and marketing executive who comes to Questex with more than 35 years of expertise in publishing, managing and selling brands,” said John McMahon, Questex Travel Group executive vice president. “As we continue to implement new strategies and brand development for our events and media, Kirk will be a tremendous asset in directing events that drive measureable results for our attendees and further our commitment to travel event buyers and suppliers.”
 
Source:- Questex Travel Group
